name: Sophelie
description: Sophelie is a horizontally scrolling shooter where you control a bird. You travel through three parts of the game fighting various enemy types including spinning planets, killer trees and giant eyeballs. Additional lives can drop from dead enemies and the game can be continued if you die. The backgrounds feature colorful parallax scrolling effects that change with each part of the game.

shot.caption: A giant hand releases  your bird.
Large planets eject smaller planets to destroy you.
After defeating an enemy type you pass a statue of a woman which signals that a new enemy is coming.
Some of the enemies are pretty bizarre, like these killer pine trees.
These giant eyeballs have the reflection of the grim reaper holding a scythe in them.
Part two changes the background graphics.
Killer snowmen attack! Yes, killer snowmen...
Game out! That means game over, although you can continue if you press fire before the counter runs out.
After dying you are presented with this image. Could that be the elusive Sophelie?
